Narrative:
On the decision of Supreme court to overturn Roe vs Wade, Vice President Kamala Harris tweeted : 

"Let me be clear: Each person has the right to make decisions about their own life—decisions such as the right to start a family, use contraception, and marry the person you love.

I know there are women out there who are afraid. To those of you who feel alone and scared: I want you to know the President and I are fighting for you and your rights. We are in this fight together."
Title: Each person has the right to make decisions about their own life : VP Harris on Roe Vs Wade'
Interest: roe vs wade, kamala harris, abortion rights
